subject: HTML
question: What are the main differences between the categories block-level and inline elements:
answer:
Block-level:
-They will appear on a new line from whatever content went before it, and any content that goes after it will also appear on a new line.
-They wouldn't be nested inside an inline element, but it might be nested inside another block-level element.

Inline:
-They will not cause a new line to appear in the document.
-They are contained within block-level elements.
